characterDescription.skinTone: light tan with warm beige undertones, visible freckles scattered across the nose and upper cheeks
characterDescription.eyeColor: medium brown eyes with a subtle amber hue, especially visible in the sunlight
characterDescription.eyeShape: almond-shaped eyes with a slight downward tilt at the outer corners, moderate eyelashes
characterDescription.hairColor: dark chestnut brown with natural sun-kissed lighter brown highlights around the face
characterDescription.hairTexture: slightly wavy hair with medium thickness, some natural volume, soft texture
characterDescription.hairStyle: long, loose hair parted slightly to the left, falling just past the shoulders, with subtle face-framing layers
characterDescription.faceShape: oval face with soft, rounded features, slightly pronounced cheekbones, and a gentle jawline
characterDescription.nose: medium-sized nose with a straight bridge and a rounded, slightly bulbous tip
characterDescription.lips: medium-sized lips, slightly fuller bottom lip than top, natural rose pink color
characterDescription.smile: warm, genuine smile showing the upper teeth, no noticeable gaps or imperfections
characterDescription.eyebrows: medium-thick dark brown eyebrows, slightly arched shape, well-groomed appearance
characterDescription.ears: ears are partially visible, appearing to be medium-sized and set relatively close to the head
characterDescription.cheeks: full cheeks with subtle rosiness, particularly noticeable when smiling
characterDescription.chin: rounded, soft chin with a slight dimple-like indentation at the center
characterDescription.facialProportions: balanced facial proportions, with eyes, nose, and mouth in harmonious scale to each other and the overall face size
characterDescription.distinctiveFeatures: scattered freckles across the nose bridge and upper cheeks, a small indentation on the chin resembling a dimple, sun-kissed natural lighter highlights in hair around the face.
characterDescription.overallImpression: warm and friendly appearance, with a natural and approachable demeanor
characterDescription.fullDescription: She has light tan skin with warm beige undertones and freckles scattered across her nose and upper cheeks. Her eyes are a medium brown with a subtle amber hue, almond-shaped with a downward tilt at the outer corners. Her dark chestnut brown hair is slightly wavy, parted on the left, and falls just past her shoulders, with natural sun-kissed highlights around her face. She has an oval-shaped face, medium-sized nose with a rounded tip, and medium-sized lips that reveal a warm, genuine smile showing upper teeth. A notable indentation exists on her chin which is rounded and soft.
